name: Find the Scout Elves — The Elf on the Shelf
name_original: Find the Scout Elves — The Elf on the Shelf
description:
Find the Scout Elves — The Elf on the Shelf is an arcade game developed by The Elf on the Shelf®.
You can play Find the Scout Elves — The Elf on the Shelf on Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play.
